products.title: Products and Technologies
products.subtitle: Configurable aerostatic platforms for every mission
products.description: Aerial surveillance systems modularly designed to adapt to each operational scenario, from tactical deployments to regional strategic surveillance.
products.intro: AEROFACTOR designs, integrates and deploys aerial surveillance systems based on state-of-the-art aerostatic platforms. Each solution is specifically configured according to the client's operational requirements: coverage range, type of threats, deployment environment and level of integration with existing systems.

tactical.title: Tactical System
tactical.excerpt: Compact platform transportable in standard vehicle, deployable by a team of 2 operators in less than 30 minutes. Ideal for tactical support, special events and emergency response.

regional.title: Regional System
regional.excerpt: Intermediate autonomy platform with capacity for multiple simultaneous sensors. Standard configuration for border control, infrastructure protection and persistent urban surveillance.

strategic.title: Strategic System
strategic.excerpt: Higher capacity platform for prolonged strategic operations, with payload up to 250 kg. Native integration with C4ISR centers and multi-user distribution.

company.title: About AeroFactor
company.subtitle: Aerial technology serving security and intelligent surveillance
company.description: Chilean company specialized in persistent aerial surveillance solutions with 24/7 coverage and 360° range.
company.intro1: AeroFactor is a Chilean company specialized in the development and implementation of persistent aerial surveillance solutions, based on aerostat systems and advanced sensors. Our technology enables continuous 24/7 observation with 360° coverage, aimed at strengthening territorial security, critical infrastructure protection and tactical support for civil and government operations.
company.intro2: With a multidisciplinary team of engineers, technicians and analysts, we work under the highest quality and confidentiality standards, ensuring that each solution adapts to the operational and strategic conditions of our clients.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Provide advanced aerial solutions that strengthen territorial and operational security through the use of reliable, autonomous and persistent technology, designed to respond to current surveillance and control challenges.
